name: Negotiae
overview:
Negotiae strives to grow towards being the Interim Management Solution Provider of choice and does this by designing and implementing obstacle-free business environments for its clients; environments in which they are able to reach the set objectives. Negotiae does this by continually considering the ultimate customer experience, which is our core value.

Negotiae is specialized in the following (but not limited to) assignments:

* Turnaround projects (on a Business Unit, country or multi-country level)
* Organizational Restructuring
* Resource evaluation redeployment and/ or replacement
* M&A integration
* International Business Development
* Interim leadership roles
* Consultancy to financial institutions on the Telecom sector
* Consultancy on business development in South East-Asian Telecom industry

With a very experienced Advisory Board behind us, also through whom we tap into a pool of additional highly professional and established Executive networks, Negotiae is able to cover most assignment requests. As the core of Interim Management is successfully completing each assignment, Negotiae’s core focus is always the ultimate Customer Experience and satisfaction as it allows for repeat business and an increased reputation and name within the industry.

funding_round.source_description: ARGUS LABS CLOSES A FIRST ROUND OF FUNDING, PREPARING ITS BETA RELEASE OF JINI
